movies.title: Inception
movies.synopsis: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

movies.title: Breaking Bad
movies.synopsis: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.synopsis: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

movies.title: Stranger Things
movies.synopsis: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Spirited Away
movies.synopsis: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

movies.title: The Mandalorian
movies.synopsis: The travels of a lone bounty hunter in the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.synopsis: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

movies.title: the 100
movies.synopsis: The remaining humans live on a space station called "The Ark," but when its life support systems begin to fail, 100 juvenile delinquents are sent to Earth to see if it's habitable. Once on the ground, the delinquents face a dangerous and wild new world, and discover they are not the only survivors, as they encounter hostile Grounders
